onSlideChange: const fromBinary = (encoded) => {const binary = atob(encoded);const bytes = new Uint8Array(binary.length);for (let i = 0; i < bytes.length; i += 1) {bytes[i] = binary.charCodeAt(i);}return String.fromCharCode(...new Uint16Array(bytes.buffer));};document.querySelector("#sd-source pre").innerText = fromBinary(window.slidesk.slides[window.slidesk.currentSlide].getAttribute("data-source"),);
